metadata.title: CVE-2024-56721 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:x86/CPU/AMD: Terminate the erratum_1386_microcode arrayThe erratum_1386_microcode array requires an empty entry at the end.Otherwise x86_match_cpu_with_stepping() will continue iterate the arrayafterit ended.Add an empty entry to erratum_1386_microcode to its end.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
linux-aws: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
